content.text: Hello! I am doing well, how about you?
I am doing well, thank you. I am a teacher at a local high school.
Nice! I am also a teacher, but I work at a middle school.
That's great! What grade do you teach?
I teach English, how about you?
I teach math. I love to geocache in my spare time.
I have never heard of geocaching before. What is it?
Geocaching is a real-world treasure hunting game using GPS-enabled devices.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I might have to try it sometime.
You should! It's a great way to get outdoors and explore your community.
I have been wanting to do more things outdoors, so I will definitely look into it.
Great! I hope you enjoy it.
Thank you! I'm sure I will.
